## ASTNode.getWsCoordinate() method

The coordinate on the workspace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getWsCoordinate(): Coordinate;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Coordinate

The workspace coordinate or null if the location is not a workspace.
